title: Sleeper Poster
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024831im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sleeper_4764.jpg)

Hello type experts. I've been a fan of typophile for many years, but recently joined.

I'm trying to find the typeface used in the poster for Woody Allen's Sleeper. An isolated version is attached, and you can view the original poster here:  
 [http://www.impawards.com/1973/sleeper\_ver1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024831/http:/www.impawards.com/1973/sleeper_ver1.html "http://www.impawards.com/1973/sleeper\_ver1.html")

This could be completely custom, or at least I believe the swashes are. Any clues or guesses would be appreciated.

Thanks for your help!
author: PatrickORourke

comments.content:
A lightly modified (the |S| in |Sleeper|, for example) Bookman Swash:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bookman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024831/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bookman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bookman/")

Other revivals of the font include Bookmania and Bookman JF Pro Complete:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024831/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/")  
 [http://marketplace.veer.com/font/Bookman-JF-Pro-Complete-JBT0001062?skey...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024831/http:/marketplace.veer.com/font/Bookman-JF-Pro-Complete-JBT0001062?skeywords=Bookman%20Swash# "http://marketplace.veer.com/font/Bookman-JF-Pro-Complete-JBT0001062?skeywords=Bookman%20Swash#")

Looks like Bookman Swash Bold [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bookman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024831/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bookman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bookman/")  
Don

Ah!

Indeed it is, or very close.

Thank you!
